Translations.Text: For the uniting of the Qurais
uniting them for the caravan of winter and summer
So let them serve the Lord of this house
who feeds them against hunger and makes them safe against fear
Hast thou considered him who calls the judgment a lie
He it is who pushes the orphan away
and urges not (others) to feed the poor
But woe to those who pray
and who are careless in their prayers
Verily, we have given thee El Kauthar
So pray to thy Lord and slaughter (victims)
Verily, he who hates thee shall be childless
